table.name: ors_status_history_line
table.description: Stores Or Line Gid information for an order release status event.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_GID
columns.description: The order release identifier for the line that is  associated with the tracking event.

columns.name: I_TRANSACTION_NO
columns.description: The transaction identifier linked to the order line.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE_GID
columns.description: The order release line that is associated with the tracking event.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
